compounddef.title: COMPUTER Computer System FreeMat is Running On

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para:
Returns a string describing the name of the system FreeMat is running on. The exact value of this string is subject to change, although the 'MAC' and 'PCWIN' values are probably fixed. str = computer Currently, the following return values are defined
'PCWIN' - MS Windows
'MAC' - Mac OS X
'UNIX' - All others
